Dawn & Dusk
is a single player 2D survival game that relies on finding food and fighting off enemies in order to survive. A random character will be created and spawned into a random environment when the game starts. Each character will have different skills and each environment will present the player with different challenge. The player have to look out for items all around the island and utilize them to have a better chance to survive.
Welcome to Dawn & Dusk
The protogonist came from a faraway island in discovering of mystery treasures. Unfortunately, a heavy downpour happened during the ship ride, towering walls of water, driven by powerful winds, slam into the ship. The ship heaved upward and vibrated in the heaviest water, crashed onto an island...
s
About Dawn & Dusk
After the shipwrecked, the journey starts with the protagonist being on an abandoned island. The protagonist has to survive and try to find a way to get off the island. The player has to find food and fight off monsters that appeared to survive. Upon exploring the island, the player realises that the island has certain secrets and has to slowly uncover them.
Conquer
Battle with mythical and odd looking monster with different combat style such as melee using sword or from a distant using gun. Solve dungeon puzzle to unlock the final battle with the boss and save the goddess Deity to escape from the island
Survive
Try to survive as long as possible in an hostile, intense environments. From freezing cold land, to scorching hot deserted island, each environment presents unique challenges and opponents.
Craft
A system that allows player to create virrtual objects during the gameplay, ranging from making a rust hammer, to mixing ingredients to create item such as healing potion in the world of Dawn & Dusk. During your advancement throughout the gameplay, forge powerful weapons and craft food to maintain your health.
Explore
A mesmerizing, exciting world of mystery awaits you. Venture into completed darkness, running through the bushes, discover and cross path with strange and peculiar creatures, dive deep into the dungeon and solve mysterious puzzles, but be wary of going too far..
